msbt.message: There you are! I was looking for you, but then I saw a cool tree branch and I stopped, .Anyway, I just really, really wanna give you this festive wreath. So I'm gonna. Riiight aboutnow!
Yay! It's yours now!OK, now stick it on your door. Even doors wanna have a good Toy Day!

Huh? Your pockets are all fulla stuff. That's not cool. That's not cool at all, 'cause now I can't give it to you.I know! Go make your pockets NOT fulla stuff and come find me. I'll give it to you then, OK? OK!
